[Del] Once upon a time.
So you got me pulling... triggers for Clay Verris.
translation.ko: 그럼 베리스를 위해 당신이 날 이용한 거네요?

translation.en: [Del] Henry, I regret my lack of candor, but listen--
How many other times you do this to me, Del?
translation.ko: 여태 몇 번이나 이런 짓을 한 거죠?

translation.en: How many times you spike a file,
send me off to AMF somebody who didn't deserve it?
translation.ko: 내가 애꿎은 사람을 죽이게 만든 거예요?

translation.en: Never ever. This was a one-off. I swear on my son's life.
translation.ko: 이게 처음이야 내 아들 목숨을 걸고 맹세해

translation.en: All right. Look, Agent Zakarewski is not a part of this.
Henry, we can fix this, I swear. But I need both of you to come back.
translation.ko: 헨리, 다 해결할 수 있어 일단 둘 다 돌아와

translation.en: To what, Del?
Okay. Gemini.
What do you know about it?
Privatized paramilitary owned by Clay Verris.
Agency does a lot of business with them. Is there more?
translation.ko: 정보국과 긴밀한 관계의... 뭐 더 있나요?

translation.en: Baron and I served under Verris in the Marines.
Uh, Panama, Kuwait, Somalia.
After he left the military, he started Gemini,
translation.ko: 그는 퇴역 후 제미니를 창설해 우릴 영입하려 했지

translation.en: and tried to hire us. We both told him no.
translation.ko: 그는 퇴역 후 제미니를 창설해 우릴 영입하려 했지 우린 둘 다 거절했고

translation.en: Except I was smart enough to move 1,500 miles away.
Yeah.
-I blew that one. -[dramatic music playing]
[Henry] Verris gets billions of dollars a year
to take out targets any way he sees fit.
That's Gemini. Off-book kidnappings, tortures.
translation.ko: 제미니를 통해서 그들은 비밀리에 납치, 고문을 자행하고

translation.en: They're who you call when you need 12 Saudi princes to quietly disappear
translation.ko: 사우디 왕자 12명을 흔적 없이 사라지게도 만들지

translation.en: or you want somebody to train your death squads.
Six weeks into sniper school,
Clay Verris takes me out on this boat about five miles.
translation.ko: 그는 날 배에 태워 8km 밖 바다로 나갔어

translation.en: Ties these weights to my ankles, tosses me overboard,
translation.ko: 내 발목에 추를 매달아 바다에 던지고는

translation.en: tells me tread water as long as I can.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 만큼 서서 헤엄쳐 보라더군

translation.en: -And he didn't know about your fear of-- -Of course he did. That was the point.
translation.ko: 물을 겁내는 걸 몰랐나요? 아니까 그런 거지

translation.en: So what did you do?
I tread water for as long as I could.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 만큼 서서 헤엄쳤지

translation.en: And then I drowned.
Dead.
He fished me out, paddled my chest.
Told me I was now ready to serve under his command.
translation.ko: 이젠 내가 자기 밑에서 일할 준비가 됐다고 하더군

translation.en: [Baron] A toast.
To the next war... -which is no war. -[Henry] Which is no war.
translation.ko: - 다음 전쟁은 일어나지 않길! - 일어나지 않길!

translation.en: [Danny] No war.
[Henry] Yeah. We'll figure it out in the morning. -Right now, we could use some shut-eye. -Sure.
translation.ko: 계획은 아침에 세우고 일단 눈 좀 붙이자

translation.en: -Uh, you folks want one room or-- -Two.
translation.ko: 그래 방 하나 쓸 거야, 아니면...? 두 개요

translation.en: Two. Two.
Well, yeah. I can put him in the garage if you want.
[Henry] All right, two rooms will be fine.
[Baron] Just giving you options. Okay, right this way.
Sniper. Rooftop. I leave, he's gonna follow.
translation.ko: 지붕에 저격수가 있어 내가 나가면 따라 나올 거야

translation.en: I need you to go with Baron someplace safe.
Shooter. On the roof.
You're a shitty house guest, you know that?
-How the hell did they find us? -She's good.
translation.ko: 우릴 어떻게 찾은 거야? 대니 꽤 능력 있어

translation.en: She's really good. She just doesn't know what she doesn't know.
translation.ko: 대니 꽤 능력 있어 아직 더 배워야 되지만

translation.en: Take care of her, all right?
-All right. -[suspenseful music continues]
[Henry] Stop right there!
Who are you?
I don't want to shoot you!
[Junior] Fine.
Don't shoot me.
Mind if I shoot you?
I could've killed you on the roof!
translation.ko: 지붕에 있을 때 죽일 수도 있었어

translation.en: [Junior] Maybe you should have.
Did they show you a picture of me?
Yeah. You look old.
Kid... you take one step closer...
translation.ko: 너, 한 발자국만 더 가까이 오면

translation.en: you're gonna leave me no choice.
-Stop! Stop! Stop! -[gunshot firing]
[Henry] Move! Move!
[Henry] Get out of the way!
-[car honking] -[Henry] Out of the way!
[Henry] Stop! Stop! Stop!
[policeman] Hands up!
Who the hell was that?
[policeman] Brogan.
Thank you, sir.
-Thank you, Captain. -[captain] No problem.
Your place is burned. Get me somewhere I can see him coming.
translation.ko: 자네 집은 노출됐으니 시야가 확보될 곳으로 가세

translation.en: [Baron] I wanted to go in there guns blazing,
but she thought the diplomatic approach made more sense.
[Henry] Yeah, gunfire might've been kinder.
-[chuckles] -Great work in there.
-[Baron] What now? -I need you to get me to Budapest.
-[Baron] What's in Budapest? -[Danny] What's in Budapest?
translation.ko: - 거기 뭐가 있는데? - 거기 뭐가 있는데요?

translation.en: Jack's informant... Yuri.
Uh, these guys aren't... trying to kill me because I want to retire.
translation.ko: 저들은 내가 은퇴한다고 죽이려는 게 아니야

translation.en: They're coming after me because they think Jack told me something classified.
translation.ko: 잭에게 기밀정보를 들은 줄 알고 제거하려는 거야

translation.en: Yuri ought to know about it.
I'm sorry, partner, my Aztec doesn't have that kind of range.
translation.ko: 미안한데 내 비행기로는 거기까지 못 가

translation.en: Well, I was hoping we'd borrow something that does.
translation.ko: 그러니까 갈 수 있는 걸 빌려야지

translation.en: Maybe a G?
Taking someone's Gulfstream?
I mean, you-- you'd really have to love a guy to do that.
translation.ko: 아주 친한 사이 아니면 그런 거 안 빌려줘

translation.en: I know just the feller. Give me a minute.
[Danny] Henry?
Did you ever have a kid?
[Henry] No. Why?
Guy on the motorcycle.
Did you notice anything funny about him?
-I noticed he was very good. -Right.
And the face?
Similarity?
Yeah, I noticed that, too.
-[Danny] So... -[spray hissing]
...you never had a long-term relationship?
No. Not unless we count you.
Is it possible that you could've had a kid without knowing it?
[Henry] No.
-Then how do you explain-- -Danny.
All right?
Thank you, by the way.
For?
For leaving Baron's apartment so I wouldn't be a target.
translation.ko: 날 보호하려고 배런의 집에서 나간 거

translation.en: Coming to get me in Georgia when you could've just run for your life.
translation.ko: 조지아주에서 혼자 안 가고 날 데리러 온 것도

translation.en: I just...
wanted to put you on a private plane, and give you a free trip to Hungary.
translation.ko: 그냥 헝가리까지 공짜로 비행기 여행 시켜주고 싶었어

translation.en: Where I'm gonna find...
Hungarians.
Right.
When I saw him...
it was like I was seeing a ghost.
A ghost with a gun.
Like... every trigger I've ever pulled.
[Clay] I told you to stay in Colombia and await orders.
I wanted to talk to you.
[Junior] He's very good.
He's the best.
That's why I sent you.
He knew every... move of mine before I made it.
I'd have him... right there, and I'd take the shot...
and... he'd be gone.
Like a ghost.
Did you get a look at his face?
Not really. I-- I saw him up the stairs, through a dirty mirror.
translation.ko: 제대로는 못 봤어요 흐린 거울에 비친 모습만 계단 밑에서 얼핏 봤죠

translation.en: I thought you were on the roof.
I was. He got a line on me.
-I had to jump down. -What do we always drill?
translation.ko: 그에게 발각돼서 뛰어내렸어요 훈련받은 거 잊었어?

translation.en: You hold the high ground. You put his back against the wall,
translation.ko: '높은 곳을 선점해라' '벽 쪽으로 몰아넣고 퇴로를 막아라'

translation.en: and you don't let him go.
I know that.
The whole thing was weird.
It was... wiggy.
How?
I don't know, it was as if I were... watching it all.
translation.ko: 나 자신이 모든 걸 지켜보는 느낌이랄까

translation.en: Who is he?
Junior, this thing that you're struggling with, this strangeness,
translation.ko: 주니어, 널 괴롭히는 그 이상한 감정은 두려움이야

translation.en: it's fear.
Don't hate it.
Lean into it.
Embrace it,
and then overcome it. You...
translation.ko: 그리고 극복해 그 고비만 넘기면 넌 최고가 될 수 있어

translation.en: are right on the threshold, son.
translation.ko: 그 고비만 넘기면 넌 최고가 될 수 있어

translation.en: This close.
You hungry?
Um... yes, sir.
Bowl of cereal sound good?
Yes, sir.
[man 1] Go!
-[man 3] Grenade! -[man 4] Hang on.
[man 5 whistling] Thank you! That's it! Back up!
Hurry up!
-Everybody back to one. -[man 5] Everybody back to one.
-[man 6] Back to one! -[man 7] Let's go!
Lots of new faces.
They'll be the first boots on the ground in Yemen.
translation.ko: 쟤들이 예멘의 첫 지상 병력이 될 거야

translation.en: Do they understand the rules of engagement or just, whatever moves, they shoot it?
translation.ko: 교전수칙은 아나요? 아니면 그냥 닥치는 대로 쏘는 건가요?

translation.en: They're elite. They're disciplined.
And if they get a clean shot at their target
through an apartment window, they'll take it.
You should think about that on your way to Budapest.
translation.ko: 부다페스트 가는 길에 그 점 잘 생각해봐

translation.en: Henry's just landed there.
You're moving out.
[Danny] Aniko?
Thank you for your time.
Here are the samples.
This I can do for you in... two days.
This I need in two hours.
We got a meeting with Yuri.
He agreed to sit with us.
You all right?
I think I know why he's as good as you, Henry.
He is you.
What?
There's a DNA lab here. I gave them samples.
Yours and the baseball cap he was wearing.
He just-- he looks so much like you, I thought he had to be your son, so I...
They did three tests.
Your DNA and his.
All three came back identical.
Not close. Identical.
As in the same person.
He's your clone.
They thought I'd made a mistake that I give them the samples
translation.ko: 연구소에선 실수로 동일인 샘플을 준 줄 알던데

translation.en: of the same person, but I didn't.
He is you.
-How's that even possible? -It's complicated, but it's doable.
All you'd really need is a surrogate mother,
-and a DNA sample. -If they could clone a person,
translation.ko: 대리모와 DNA 샘플만 있으면요 사람을 복제할 수 있다면

translation.en: you-- you'd think they'd clone more doctors or scientists,
not... me.
They could've cloned Nelson Mandela.
Nelson Mandela couldn't kill a man on a moving train
from two kilometers away.
[Baron] Yuri.
Mr. Brogan.
[Yuri] Before we begin, I must confess, I have admired your work for many years.
translation.ko: 먼저 말해두는데 난 오래전부터 당신 실력에 감탄해왔어요

translation.en: [Henry] Wait. -So... you know who I am? -[Yuri laughing]
A longtime listener, first-time caller, as they say in your country.
translation.ko: 늘 멀리서 지켜보다가 오늘 처음 만난 거죠

translation.en: I would congratulate you... [grunts] ...on your retirement, but...
your last job has loose ends, yes?
Yeah, well, my government lied to me, then tried to kill me
-if that's what you mean. -Yes.
In Russia, we call that "Tuesday."
But Americans... it hurts your feelings.
So...
So, why was Dormov trying to go back to Russia and why was I sent to kill him?
translation.ko: 왜 도르모프는 러시아로 돌아가려 했고 난 그의 암살에 동원된 거죠?

translation.en: Yes, down to business. Very American.
You are a busy man.
We were both friends with Jack.
He was a good man.
I'm mourning his death, like you.
But the reason you are here... and I have not killed you...
translation.ko: 하지만 당신이 여기 온 이유나 내가 당신을 아직

translation.en: yet...
is we share a common enemy.
Clay Verris.
He lured Dormov to the West, funded his lab.
translation.ko: 그가 도르모프를 서방으로 유인해 연구소를 세워줬소

translation.en: And now you have met the fruits of their labor.
translation.ko: 그 연구의 결실을 당신이 만난 거죠

translation.en: Dolly the sheep was cloned in '96.
-But in '95-- -I was the sheep.
Take it as a compliment.
And you are the only one.
With your DNA, Verris raised the boy as his own son.
translation.ko: 당신 DNA로 베리스는 자기 아들을 만들어

translation.en: Trained him to be the perfect assassin.
So why was Dormov trying to leave?
For years, we tried to lure him back. Nothing.
translation.ko: 그동안은 우리가 아무리 돌아오라고 해도 소용이 없었소

translation.en: Then last year, they had a falling out.
-Dormov got scared, reached out to me. -So, I--
translation.ko: 겁에 질린 도르모프는 내게 연락을 했소 그걸로는

translation.en: that still doesn't explain why I was sent to kill him.
translation.ko: 날 보낸 이유가 설명이 안 돼요

translation.en: We have indications Dormov made a breakthrough.
translation.ko: 도르모프가 뭔가 큰 발견을 했던 거 같소

translation.en: Modified human DNA.
A path to mass production.
But Dormov wanted soldiers to be stronger, smarter.
translation.ko: 그가 원한 건 더 강하고 똑똑한 병사였소

translation.en: Verris...
Verris wanted something else.
What something else?
[Yuri] Mr. Brogan...
you are the best at what you do.
But still you get tired.
translation.ko: 하지만 때론 당신도 지칠 거요 두려움, 의심

translation.en: You have fears, doubts. You feel pain, perhaps remorse.
translation.ko: 하지만 때론 당신도 지칠 거요 두려움, 의심 고통도 느끼겠죠 어쩌면 회한도

translation.en: You have a conscience.
This makes you human...
but suboptimal as a soldier.
Less than perfect.
Less profitable.
Clayton Verris is playing God with DNA.
translation.ko: 클레이 베리스는 DNA로 신의 놀이를 하고 있소

translation.en: He must be stopped.
If it's that dangerous, why not send a missile?
Blow up his lab.
That is what we're doing.
Except you... are the missile.
translation.ko: 문젠, 당신이 바로 그 미사일이라는 거지

translation.en: I wish you luck.
Oh, one last thing.
Your escape from home two days ago? [exhales sharply]
Amazing work. I was on the edge of my seat.
Wait. What?
How the hell do you know about that?
I'm a big fan. What can I say?
[Danny] If even half of what he's saying is true...
we gotta talk to this kid.
You're not gonna be safe until you do.
Oh, so you think if your 50 year old self showed up,
and told you you were her clone, that would make you calmer?
Fifty-one.
-What? -Just saying...
-You know you're 51, Henry? -I'm aware of it.
Right.
He's the mirror you don't want to look into, Henry.
But he's our best shot at getting to Verris.
[man] Janet Lassiter?
Who wants to know?
Got a message for you, ma'am... from a man who transferred a 1,000 dollars
into my Feathercoin account just to make sure you got it. [exhales]
Does this person have a name?
His name is "A 1,000 Dollars Into My Feathercoin Account."
"Hello, Janet. Before you try to kill me again, consider this.
translation.ko: '안녕, 재닛' '날 또 공격하기 전에 잘 들어둬'

translation.en: Your home address is 1362 Carrol Grove.
The security alarm code is 1776.
You awaken at 6:12 every morning,
and stop for your decaf soy latte with an extra shot by 6:42.
translation.ko: '6시 42분에 디카페인 두유 라테를 샷 추가해서 마시고'

translation.en: Every night you stand in front of your huge living room window,
sipping a Jose Cuervo margarita...
with Forensic Files on the TV...
wearing your nice, comfy sweatpants."
This is Lassiter.
[Henry] There are shooters at your ten and two.
Get up off of that chair. You will be AMF'ed.
Now, if I thought the world needed another me, I would've had a kid.
translation.ko: 또 다른 내가 필요했다면 자식을 낳았을 거야

translation.en: The program predates my arrival at the Agency. You must know that.
translation.ko: 그 프로그램은 내가 입사하기 전에 시작됐어 그걸 알아둬

translation.en: Yeah. Perfect D.C. answer. Something goes wrong, duck!
Tip the bike guy.
You can go.
[Henry] Now, I have your agent with me against her will.
translation.ko: 내가 네 요원 한 명을 강제로 데려왔어

translation.en: Danielle Zakarewski.
She wants to come in.
-[Janet] Fine. -Uh, like me, she is a patriot.
Unlike me, she still wants to spend the next couple decades
translation.ko: 나와는 달리 너 같은 위선자들 밑에서

translation.en: scoring touchdowns for you assholes.
Her safety is nonnegotiable.
[Henry] Ten and two, Janet.
[Barista] Decaf soy latte with an extra shot for Janet.
translation.ko: 샷 추가한 디카페인 두유 라테 나왔습니다

translation.en: [Henry] The only person I'll turn her over to
is the guy you sent after me in Cartagena.
Don't even think about sending anybody else.
Family reunion.
-Very sweet. -Yeah. Keep it up.
translation.ko: 감동의 가족 상봉 멋지네 실컷 빈정대

translation.en: You'll be the first person I ever killed for free.
translation.ko: 넌 처음으로 돈 안 받고 죽여줄게

translation.en: How quickly can you get him to Budapest?
translation.ko: 얼마나 빨리 부다페스트로 보낼 수 있지?

translation.en: [Janet] Five minutes?
Good.
She'll be in the courtyard of the Vajdahunyad Castle
at midnight tonight.
Enjoy your latte.
[Baron] What's AMF?
[Danny] "Adios, motherfucker."
[Henry] How the hell does he know we're here?
translation.ko: 우리가 여기 온 걸 어떻게 알았지?

translation.en: This is gonna work, right?
Yes.
How do you know?
I know his taste.
Wait, are you saying you're attracted to me?
Me? Now? Hell, no.
But the younger, less-mature version, maybe.
translation.ko: 하지만 젊고 미숙한 난 끌릴 수도 있지

translation.en: When I came for you... in Georgia...
translation.ko: 조지아주에서 자넬 구하러 집에 갔을 때

translation.en: I didn't have to think about that.
It was instinct.
He was born with that, too.
Besides, he wants me.
[Junior] Right.
[Danny] Lovely courtyard.
I'm sorry, ma'am.
Before we go any farther, I'm gonna need you to strip.
translation.ko: 더 가기 전에 여기서 옷을 벗으세요

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
I need to be certain you're not wearing a wire.
Okay, first of all...
"ma'am"?
I was raised to respect my elders.
[Junior] Take your clothes off, please.
Turn around, please.
I see you like to be thorough.
Caution has kept me alive.
Call his burner.
-Thank you. -[dial tone beeping]
[Henry] Brogan.
In 12 minutes, I'm putting two bullets in the back of her head.
translation.ko: 12분 뒤, 난 이 여자 뒤통수에 총 두 발을 쏠 거야

translation.en: [Henry] Your orders are to deliver her safely.
My orders are to kill you.
Are you familiar with the Quartz Chamber of the catacombs?
[Henry] Negative. We're doing this someplace visible, where I can see you.
translation.ko: 불가, 내가 널 볼 수 있는 곳에서 만나

translation.en: Now you have 11 minutes.
Get dressed. We're taking a ride.
[Danny] Cab was a smart move.
Where are you from?
Your formality, it's Southern.
translation.ko: 격식 차리는 거 보면 남부 같은데

translation.en: You know, if you're gonna use me as bait and possibly murder me,
then the least you can do is indulge me in some conversation.
[Junior] Just outside Atlanta.
You two have a lot in common.
[Junior] I doubt that.
You'd be surprised.
You know, I started following him, too. Just like you're doing.
Then I got to know him.
He's got a big heart, like you.
What do you know about my heart?
translation.ko: 내 마음이 어떤지 당신이 뭘 알아?

translation.en: I know that you have one.
And I know that it's telling you that something
about the job you've been given isn't right.
